caption.title: Detection of viral RNA and infectious virus in placentomes.
caption.p: Viral RNA copies in placentomes as determined by RT-qPCR (black columns; left y-axis) and virus titres in placentomes as determined by virus isolation (grey columns; right y-axis). Results of experiment 1 (A) and 2 (B) represent means and SDs of 3 placentomes per foetus.
